title: Sanitize error messages - remove stack traces from user output
description: Full error objects including stack traces exposed at useBlockTerminal.ts:86 and InteractiveBlock.tsx:146. Shows system paths and internals. Sanitize before display.

title: Create split pane container with resize handles
Add React Error Boundary around BlocksView
description: No error boundaries in codebase. If any block component throws, entire app crashes. Wrap BlocksView and InteractiveBlock.

title: Add block array eviction policy (max 500 blocks)
description: blocks array grows indefinitely at useBlockTerminal.ts:8. 1000 blocks = 10MB+ state. Add MAX_BLOCKS constant and evict oldest when exceeded.

title: Add settings button to Ghostty mode titlebar
Fix command injection vulnerability in PTY spawning
description: User input passed directly to shell via spawn(shell, ['-c', command]) at useBlockTerminal.ts:38 and InteractiveBlock.tsx:108. Allows arbitrary code execution. Need to add command allowlist or proper escaping.

title: Fix WebGL context leaks in InteractiveBlock terminal disposal
description: WebGL addon at InteractiveBlock.tsx:72-80 not fully disposed. 20-50MB per terminal leaked. Dispose addon before terminal, clear buffers.

title: Create Electron preload script with IPC bridge
Implement Electron IPC handlers (fs, http, shell, pty)
Fix PTY process memory leaks - track all spawned processes
description: Only activePtyRef.current tracks last PTY - all previous processes orphaned. 100 commands = 99 leaked processes = 500MB+ leaked. Need Map<blockId, PTY> and cleanup on unmount. File: useBlockTerminal.ts:38-75

title: Fix race condition in PTY callbacks (onData vs onExit)
description: Multiple callbacks compete for state updates without synchronization. onData can fire after onExit, corrupting state. Add isProcessComplete flag. File: useBlockTerminal.ts:46-75

Update frontend to use platform abstraction
Add Tauri commands for new window creation
Enable Content Security Policy in Tauri config
description: CSP disabled at tauri.conf.json:26-28 with csp: null. No XSS protection. Enable proper CSP policy.
